channel.title: Posts on tonibeck.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on tonibeck.github.io

item.title: Azure Monitor - Networks
item.description: Azure has a number of tools for network monitoring. Now Azure Monitor for Networks is in preview - a consolidation of all tools into one single dashboard.

item.title: Unifi Network Controller on Azure
item.description: Unifi Networking with the controller hosted on Azure - a simple and powerful approach to a Home Network.

item.title: My other Computer is an Azure Datacenter - Joining Microsoft
item.description: The year 2020 is an exciting year as it brings a number changes for me - including a professional change. Long story short, after more than 6 years in the networking space, I have decided to make a shift towards cloud. I got the chance to join Microsoft into the role of a Cloud Solution Architect within the Custer Success Unit in Munich. And guess what, I took it :-)
